labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The overlay does not appear and the game cannot be interacted with in any way.
data.short_description: Settings two keybinds for enabling overlay to the same key causes the application to lose all functionality
data.steps_to_repro: - Open User Settings- Open the Overlay tab- Enable overlay- Set keybind- Open Keybinds tab- Add keybind to Toggle Overlay Lock, same keybind as previous.- Launch Game- Enable overlay via keybind
